clinical_study.brief_title: Integrating Conservative Kidney Management Options and Advance Care Planning Into a Pre-Dialysis Educational Program
clinical_study.official_title: Integrating Conservative Kidney Management Options and Advance Care Planning Into a Pre-Dialysis Educational Program

brief_summary.textblock: The goals of this work will be to evaluate the preliminary efficacy of a comprehensive pre-dialysis education program on increased knowledge of conservative kidney management and advance care planning among patients with advanced CKD.

detailed_description.textblock: This intervention will be randomized among patients with advanced chronic kidney disease.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Comprehensive pre-dialysis program incorporating conservative and advance care planning education

primary_outcome.measure: Knowledge of conservative kidney management and advance care planning
primary_outcome.description: Change in knowledge of conservative kidney management and advance care planning (mean score)

secondary_outcome.measure: Communication of EOL preferences with healthcare providers and family members

other_outcome.measure: Completion of healthcare proxy forms, living wills, and POLST forms
other_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 post intervention and 12 weeks post-intervention

arm_group.description: Standard pre-dialysis options education including hemodialysis, peritoneal dialysis, and kidney transplantation
Standard ESRD education + conservative kidney management and advance care planning education

intervention.intervention_name: ESRD education + conservative kidney management and ACP education
intervention.description: Targeted conservative kidney management and advance care planning education delivered in person by trained healthcare providers

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Stage 4 or 5 CKD (defined by the CKD-EPI estimation of GFR < 30 ml/min/1.73m2)
- Age 65 years or greater or frail
- self-reported Black or White race
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of dementia
- History of legal blindness
- Listed for kidney transplantation
